resources.string: Please, set your PIN Code. The PIN Code must be 6 digits
For security reasons, the numpad layout is randomized
Please, re-enter the same PIN Code that you have entered in previous step
You have set PIN Code successfully
Your PINs do not match. Please, try again
You have activated your account successfully
"OCB iOTP was built by OCB for secure your transaction based on the Policy of The State Bank of Viet Nam. For more information, Please click here"
Your PINs do not match. Please, try again
Please, enter this OTP at Verification transaction step on Internet Banking/ Mobile Banking
The OTP is available in 60 seconds
You donâ€™t have any transaction need to verify.
OCB iOTP was built by OCB for secure your transaction based on the Policy of The State Bank of Viet Nam For more information, Please click here

* Biometrics: 
When you turn ON, system will allow you to login application by Fingerprint or Face Regconization (It depends on your mobile device) 
When you turn OFF, system will set default login method as PIN Code 
* GPS Location: When you turn ON, system will record your location when you submit transaction. It will protect you and easy to check with the bank when you have any issue 
When you turn OFF, System does not record your location when you submit transaction
